tool.name: Transpose
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert*
-----
This tool performs a transpose operation on a time series dataset. It is useful if you have a dataset where each column is a time series.
**Example**
- Input::
1 9 2 0 5 2 4 2 2 3 5 1
- Outputs::
1 5 2 9 2 3 2 4 5 0 2 1
